body:
Hi Mostapha, Chris and group members,



When I clicked the boolean toggle of **Psychrometric Chart** component, the whole system crashed. 

I'll appreciate it if you give me a hand. Thank you in advance.



Xiaojian

replies.body:
Hi Xiaojian,



Your file works fine on my machine. Did you check [this?](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/psychrometric-chart-crashing?commentId=2985220%3AComment%3A1547033&groupId=2985220%3AGroup%3A658987) and [this?](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/psychrometric-chart-crashes-when-connects-windspeed)



Devang

Hi Devang,



I checked that post, so i need to upload my rhino version. I'm working on it now.



Thank you for your immediate reply. :)



Xiaojian

Hi Devang,

It works well. Thanks for your help.

Xiaojian
